summary: Dedicated RN with over 20 years experience in nursing seeking career transition into a new clinical setting. Able to offer a solid foundation in occupational health, office management, triage, endoscopy, homecare, primary patient care and current healthcare advancements. Highly motivated, dedicated, flexible and compassionate with proven expertise in communication, organization and documentation skills. Valuable interpersonal skills, forging relationships and collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to develop outstanding care/support and to facilitate a friendly and caring environment. Dependable, responsible and autonomous; able to work independently or within a group.

experience.title: Occupational Health Nurse Coordinator
experience.description: Provided comprehensive occupational and environmental health services including occupational medicine, industrial hygiene, industrial safety and administrative tasks. Assessed injuries/illness, performed first aid and CPR/AED; educated employees on basic health care; monitored health conditions; dispensed medications; trained and supported staff; managed health risks; referred employees to appropriate medical services; developed and implemented wellness program activities; coordinated policies, SOPs and standing orders; maintained employee records; hosted health-related seminars and education programs; monitored inventory and supplies; coordinated annual health programs.

experience.title: Physician Liaison/Nurse Triage/GI Nurse
experience.description: Assisted physicians in patient care, triaged incoming calls, advised on basic treatment, and scheduled visits. Managed diagnostic results via email/phone, prescriptions and pre-authorizations, scheduling, and completed medical forms. Acted as an extension of the healthcare team, ensuring appropriate referrals and adherence to regional standards. Provided GI/endoscopy support, including peri-procedural care and specimen handling; maintained documentation and coordination of patient care and education.

experience.title: Home Healthcare Nurse
experience.description: Performed comprehensive home-based nursing care, assessed developmental stages and conditions, administered medications, and maintained patient charts/care plans. Coordinated all aspects of home care with other disciplines and agencies, completed admissions, and conducted follow-up visits per patient needs and insurance authorization. Demonstrated strong clinical judgment and effective communication throughout care delivery.
